artist: Author: Stewart Home; Publisher: Sabotage Editions, London
creditline: Fly Zine Archive, The Mary and Robyn Campbell Fund for Art Books and gift of funds from Mary and Bob Mersky
description: Saddle stitched binding, photo-collage of letterpress text, designs, and image of a face printed in offset lithography on pale blue wove paper covers; 68 pp.
title: Jean Baudrillard & The Psychogeorgraphy of Nudism
